replies.body: Alright, I'll explain it. So basically, if you're in the "All Time" tab, then the number that appears, eg. 20 monuments on November first, that means that you broke 20 monuments between October 2 and November 1. If you're in the "weekly" tab, it'll show the monuments broken for each day. Daily tab will show monuments for each hour.
replies.body_tagged: Alright, I'll explain it. So basically, if you're in the "All Time" tab, then the number that appears, eg. 20 monuments on November first, that means that you broke 20 monuments between October 2 and November 1. If you're in the "weekly" tab, it'll show the monuments broken for each day. Daily tab will show monuments for each hour.
